tool.name: Design2DoETool
tool.description: Generate DoE instructions from a Design sheet.
tool.help:
Generate Design of Experiments (DoE) instructions from a **Design sheet**.
- Inputs: - Design sheet: an *xlsx* file with the following columns:
- DoE position: position in the construct. i.e. 1,2,3.. - DoE permutation class: 1 if the gene position can be rearranged. - DoE designation: origin, resistance, promoter or gene. - Part number: SBC identifier or '-' for empty promoter - Name: part name.
- Library size: desired size of the library.
- Outputs: - JMP script instructions in order to generate the combinatorial library.
